title: my lvl reseted to 1 + game name changed
body:
I have a lvl 30 account wich is gold rankend , after this new patch i relogged and my game name changed and my lvl 30 was set back to lvl 1.
Now i am trying to get it back but no succes yet Plz help...

replies.body:
Since this is an account-specific issue that will require one of our account specialists to investigate, I recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) into our support. We'll be able to better address this issue there.

Let me know if you have any questions.
